name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Transformation sequence as Kanata changes her outfit.
MC section during the song performance.

subtitles.original: 一番高い林檎　掴みたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to grab the highest apple

subtitles.original: 失くしてから気付く　尊いモノ
subtitles.english: Realizing its value only after losing it

subtitles.original: 幼い僕等は　的外れだらけさ
subtitles.english: We were young and filled with irrelevance

subtitles.original: 満ち足りた日々の制圧は
subtitles.english: The suppression of fulfilled days

subtitles.original: 情緒不安定になる
subtitles.english: Becomes emotionally unstable

subtitles.original: 傷を負ってでも
subtitles.english: Even with wounds

subtitles.original: 羽ばたきたいと願うよ
subtitles.english: I wish to fly

subtitles.original: 愚かでいいのだろう
subtitles.english: It's okay to be foolish

subtitles.original: 見渡す夢の跡
subtitles.english: The traces of dreams as far as the eye can see

subtitles.original: さよなら　蒼き日々よ
subtitles.english: Goodbye, blue days

subtitles.original: 輝く空は　無邪気そう装い
subtitles.english: The shining sky pretends to be innocent

subtitles.original: 落陽を待ち伏せしていた
subtitles.english: Lurking in wait for the sunset

subtitles.original: 僕等は目指した Shangri-La
subtitles.english: We aimed for Shangri-La

subtitles.original: 欲望は抑えきれずに
subtitles.english: Unable to suppress our desires

subtitles.original: 空想にまみれた
subtitles.english: Covered in fantasies

subtitles.original: 自由を求め続けた
subtitles.english: Continuing to seek freedom

subtitles.original: 距離をおいてこそ
subtitles.english: Only by keeping distance

subtitles.original: 自分の大きさを知る
subtitles.english: Do you realize your own size

subtitles.original: 未熟な心は
subtitles.english: An immature heart

subtitles.original: それさえ分からないまま
subtitles.english: Without even understanding that

subtitles.original: 今なら言えるだろう
subtitles.english: Now I can say it

subtitles.original: 此処がそう楽園さ
subtitles.english: This place is paradise

subtitles.original: さよなら　蒼き日々よ
subtitles.english: Goodbye, blue days

subtitles.original: 遥か空響いてる　祈りは奇跡に
subtitles.english: Resonating in the distant sky, a prayer becomes a miracle

subtitles.original: ETERNAL BLAZE
subtitles.english: ETERNAL BLAZE

subtitles.original: このライブも、もう折り返しに来てます！
subtitles.english: This live is already halfway through!

subtitles.original: みんな、まだまだ、まだまだ盛り上がっていけるよね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, we can still, still, still get more hyped, right!

subtitles.original: 真夜中の蒼に溶けて
subtitles.english: Melting into the midnight blue

subtitles.original: 流れてく涙の粒
subtitles.english: Streaming drops of tears

subtitles.original: 迷いなく包み込むぬくもりに出会った
subtitles.english: I met a warmth that envelops without hesitation

subtitles.original: 真っ白な雪のようにどこまでも素直な言葉
subtitles.english: Words as honest as pure white snow

subtitles.original: 鉄の羽纏った僕を動かしてく
subtitles.english: They set me in motion, clad in iron wings

subtitles.original: 傷つくたびに優しくなれる
subtitles.english: Every time I get hurt, I can become kinder

subtitles.original: 君のその笑顔だけ守り抜きたい
subtitles.english: I want to protect only your smile

subtitles.original: 願いはひとつ
subtitles.english: There is only one wish

subtitles.original: 時空を越え刻まれた悲しみの記憶
subtitles.english: Memories of sadness carved across time and space

subtitles.original: まっすぐに受け止める君は光の女神
subtitles.english: You, accepting everything head-on, are the goddess of light

subtitles.original: あの日胸に灯った永遠の炎
subtitles.english: The eternal flame lit in my heart that day

subtitles.original: 深い闇解き放って自由のトビラ開いてく
subtitles.english: Releasing the deep darkness, opening the door to freedom

subtitles.original: 強く果てない未来へ
subtitles.english: Toward a strong and endless future

subtitles.original: 冷たい緑の月に映し出す心の影
subtitles.english: The shadow of the heart reflected on the cold green moon

subtitles.original: 淋しげに呟いた君の傍にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be by your side, as you whispered lonely
